comments: Dr. Singh is a wonderful Prof at UPB. Very helpful, willing to work one-on-one, just finished Mol Bio course, even though the material was tough but he made subject easy to understand--specially the regulatory factors of transcription and translation mechanism. Labs were useful and fun to learn. Just can\'t wait to be in his Microbiology class.
